name: Fruit Paradise: Farm Pop Crush
description:
Fruit Paradise is a very classic fruit puzzle game! It's very challenging for your reaction speed.
Slice the fruits by connect three or more same fruits. Try to use props to make more and more combos!
Fruit Paradise features:
- Over 170 juice levels
- Adorable graphics and sounds
- Easy to start but hard to fruit master
- Lots of blocks need to solve, tons of fun, you will never get bored
